DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
This effect has not yet been included and is currently on my to-do list.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
For every #b5 stacks of #yVicious you deal #b1 extra damage on attacks and take #b1 extra damage when attacked.
Bully X: Gain X #yVicious.
Can only be applied to non-attacking enemies. NL #yTaunted enemies are forced to attack.
Can only be applied to attacking enemies. NL #yIntimidated enemies are forced to defend and gain Block equal to #b10 plus half your Vicious.
#yArmor #yPiercing X: NL Enemies lose HP equal to #bX% of their destroyed Block.
If the condition is fulfilled, attack the next enemy.
#yEvolving Cards specializing in #yLacerate.
#yLacerated creatures lose #b2% of their Max HP at the start of their turn.
#yKneecapped creatures take damage equal to #b5% of their missing HP at the start of their turn, for three turns. Counts as Lacerate.
#yNicked creatures take damage equal to #b3.3% of their Max HP at the start of their turn, for three turns. Counts as Lacerate.
Increase the power of all Fenrir cards by #b1 whenever you fulfill the #yEvolve condition.
Cards specializing in deck cycling and against buffed enemies.
#yFlash #bX: Discard up to #bX cards. Bonuses per discard: NL 1+ Card: Gain #b1 bonus damage. NL 2+ Cards: draw a card. NL X: Activate the Flash effect.
#yPower #yFlash #bX: Discard up to #bX cards. Bonuses per discard: NL 1+ Card: Gain 1 bonus damage. NL 2+ Cards: draw a card. NL X-1: Activate the Flash effect once.
0-cost attack card with #yEthereal and #yExhaust

#yUtility #yFlash #bX: Discard up to #bX cards. Doesn't draw. Bonuses per discard: NL Attack: Deal #b1 bonus damage. NL Skill: Gain #b3 #yBlock. NL 2 Powers: gain #b1 #yEnergy NL 2 Status/Curse: Draw #b1 card.
Versatile cards specializing in #yMana #yBurn and damage mitigation.
Creatures affected by #yMana #yBurn lose #b3% Max HP per stack when casting buffs, debuffs and spells.
Ignite X: Trigger up to #bX stacks of target enemy's #yMana #yBurn.
#yChargeable cards specializing against enemies with #yBlock and defensive powers.
Staggered creatures deal less and take more Damage. #yLeviathan cards apply a stronger Stagger based on enemy Block.
Augment this card's effect if you have enough #yCharges. NL Increases by #b1 at the end of your turn.
Cards specializing in #yHunger and improving the player's HP.
Augment this card's effect at the cost of #yHunger. NL #yHunger Increases by #b1 whenever you play a non-Revenant card.
Hunger bonus effects are disabled. NL Gain #b2 Temporary HP while Sated.
If you kill the target before the turn ends, gain #b1 Max HP for every #b20 damage you deal. NL Does not work on minions.
Gain #b1 #yTemporary HP for every #b8 damage you deal. NL If you kill it, heal for half that amount instead.
Splits into two 0-cost attack cards.
Double damage if the last played card was Left Half. NL Becomes Severed Scissors after use.
Double damage if the last played card was Right Half.
Remove all of your Legendary Weapon cards from your deck and gain a new Weapon's cards.
While Protective Blade is active, gain Block instead of Vicious.
Return up to #b3 cards from the bottom of your discard pile to your draw pile. NL Draw #b1 card.
Reduces your #yRevolver shot count by #b1. NL Requires Reloading when at #b0 shots.
